24 #include <inttypes.h>
25 #include <stdio.h>
26 
27 #include "khash.h"
28 
29 #include "bgpstream_utils_pfx.h"
30 
31 char *bgpstream_pfx_snprintf(char *buf, size_t len, bgpstream_pfx_t *pfx)
32 {
33  char *p = buf;
34 
35  /* print the address */
36  if(bgpstream_addr_ntop(buf, len, &(pfx->address)) == NULL)
37  {
38  return NULL;
39  }
40 
41  while(*p != '\0')
42  {
43  p++;
44  len--;
45  }
46 
47  /* print the mask */
48  snprintf(p, len, "/%"PRIu8, pfx->mask_len);
49 
50  return buf;
51 }
52 
53 
54 #if UINT_MAX == 0xffffffffu
55 unsigned int
56 #elif ULONG_MAX == 0xffffffffu
57 unsigned long
58 #endif
59 bgpstream_ipv4_pfx_hash(bgpstream_ipv4_pfx_t *pfx)
60 {
61  // embed the network mask length in the 32 bits
62  return __ac_Wang_hash(pfx->address.ipv4.s_addr | (uint32_t)pfx->mask_len);
63 }
64 
65 
66 #if ULONG_MAX == ULLONG_MAX
67 unsigned long
68 #else
69 unsigned long long
70 #endif
71 bgpstream_ipv6_pfx_hash(bgpstream_ipv6_pfx_t *pfx)
72 {
73  // ipv6 number - we take most significant 64 bits only
74  unsigned char *s6 = &(pfx->address.ipv6.s6_addr[0]);
75  uint64_t address = *((uint64_t *) s6);
76  // embed the network mask length in the 64 bits
77  return __ac_Wang_hash(address | (uint64_t)pfx->mask_len);
78 }
79 
80 
81 #if ULONG_MAX == ULLONG_MAX
82 unsigned long
83 #else
84 unsigned long long
85 #endif
86 bgpstream_pfx_storage_hash(bgpstream_pfx_storage_t *pfx)
87 {
88  if(pfx->address.version == BGPSTREAM_ADDR_VERSION_IPV4)
89  {
90  return bgpstream_ipv4_pfx_hash((bgpstream_ipv4_pfx_t *)pfx);
91  }
92  if(pfx->address.version == BGPSTREAM_ADDR_VERSION_IPV6)
93  {
94  return bgpstream_ipv6_pfx_hash((bgpstream_ipv6_pfx_t *)pfx);
95  }
96  return 0;
97 }
98 
99 
100 int bgpstream_ipv4_pfx_equal(bgpstream_ipv4_pfx_t *pfx1,
101  bgpstream_ipv4_pfx_t *pfx2)
102 {
103  return ((pfx1->mask_len == pfx2->mask_len) &&
104  bgpstream_ipv4_addr_equal(&pfx1->address, &pfx2->address));
105 }
106 
107 
108 int bgpstream_ipv6_pfx_equal(bgpstream_ipv6_pfx_t *pfx1,
109  bgpstream_ipv6_pfx_t *pfx2)
110 {
111  // note: it could be faster to use a loop when inserting differing prefixes
112 
113  return ((pfx1->mask_len == pfx2->mask_len) &&
114  bgpstream_ipv6_addr_equal(&pfx1->address, &pfx2->address));
115 }
116 
117 
118 int bgpstream_pfx_storage_equal(bgpstream_pfx_storage_t *pfx1,
119  bgpstream_pfx_storage_t *pfx2)
120 {
121  if(pfx1->mask_len == pfx2->mask_len)
122  {
123  return bgpstream_addr_storage_equal(&pfx1->address, &pfx2->address);
124  }
125  return 0;
126 }
